original_text: So Jephthah ran away from his brothers. He went to live in the land of Tob. Other men joined the group that Jephthah led. They did not obey any laws.
korean_text: 이에 입다가 그의 형제들을 피하여 돕 땅에 거주하매 잡류가 그에게로 모여 와서 그와 함께 출입하였더라

sentences.original_text: So Jephthah ran away from his brothers
He went to live in the land of Tob
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 도브 땅에서 살기 위해 갔다

sentences.original_text: They did not obey any laws
